name: Flux (RitaRBapoDev)
description:
Flux is a team project developed for the course of Rapid game prototyping of the degree Game Programming - Bachelor of Software Engineering in the Media Design School university in New Zealand.

Flux's premise is that the player is a robot constantly running out of battery and therefore must always be chasing the next pack of batteries before its own runs out. Unfortunately for it, these batteries are within an ever changing maze filled with deadly traps.

The player's goal is to continuously move forward while catching the always respawning batteries and dodging all the traps.

Controls:

  • W or Right trigger  to move forward
  • Space bar or Square(PS4)/X(Xbox) to slow down time for a few seconds

In the end the player can submit their score to an online data base and check it against other players.
